post.body: you better keep that guy if he goes out in the below zero weather and starts you car for you
if you quack while you are walking down the street, you may want to keep it in a very soft quack
I see and he would be the remote start,the one that goes outside and starts your car for you
you need one of them remote car starters for your car
yes to be young again,he does have a great voice, his future is golden
thanks for commenting, alot of my treasuries to have things that sell in them, that why I make them, promoting other shops
thank you, I watch the birds all fluffed up around my feeder and think how tough winter is on them, keeping feeder full
I just have one wood stove, but yesterday when it was -5 here in kansas, I was at the wood pile alot
you drive safe on the roads and if the sidewalk is slick, remember to walk like a duck
we are supposed to get a wintry mix this afternoon too, then snow
my neighbor left for the airport to fly from kansas to seattle, he may have a lay over someplace on the way
my neighbor is flying out to seattle in a few hours, did they get alot of snow
post office to mail things you sold would be good, going to post office to mail christmas packages is not so good
what is that magic word to use for a treasury to make FP
that is for sure why I make treasuries is to help promote other shops and alot of my treasuries has made sells for people
I have about run out of ideas for a theme for one
I listed a photo of a male cardinal few days ago
it was so cold yesterday I made a treasury on the animals and people coping with winter http://tinyurl.com/7r3fpj
good morning twitter friends, warmed up to the low 30's this morning, better than -5 yesterday morning,supposed to get more snow in kansas
I have been making several trips to the wood pile today to load up the stove, it was -5 this morning in kansas and hasnt warmed up much
